name: Eu
startIntroPart1: Oh great Itaú Aku from the great valleys of southern Armenia, who with his diplomatic ability managed to unite the Eu peoples into an honorable nation and I expel the Esca, our great enemies, from the holy city of Cal !
startIntroPart2: !Oh Itaú, with your firmness and courage, could you guide Eu again to its great glory !
attacked: A people with a bad leader dares to attack us?
defeated: How is it possible that?,Our great god Eu will take care of them .
introduction: Aotū, I am Itaú Aku from these valleys .
neutralHello: Hello, how can I help you?
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
